parameters.name: DownloadToFile
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to download the log file. Default value: false. Valid values:

*   false
*   true

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the query. Default value: current time.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The job ID. For more information about how to obtain a job ID, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).

parameters.name: MaxLines
parameters.description: The maximum number of log entries. Default value: 2000.

parameters.name: PodId
parameters.description: The node ID. For more information about how to obtain a node ID, see [GetJob](~~459677~~).

parameters.name: PodUid
parameters.description: The node UID. For more information about how to obtain a node UID, see [GetJob](~~459677~~).

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the query. Default value: 7 days ago.
